issue.title: Displaying scale only in meter/in miles
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

The goal is that the MAP displays the scale information in:
- one system (metric/miles)
- in both system

The Administrator should have the possibility to configure this from the back-end.

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

This feature has been realized before new feature acceptance process...
